text.div:
HSPC Height Units of Measure Value Set

The list of codes that describe the length units used for height.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
    CodeDisplay
    [in_us]Inch [length]
    [ft_us]Foot [length]
    cmCentimeter [SI Length Units]

name: HSPC Height Units of Measure Value Set
description: The list of codes that describe the length units used for height.
copyright: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement
